pages.text: Welcome, practitioner of the sanguine arts.

The $(animus)Codex Animus$() contains knowledge of blood magic's darker applications; the manipulation of life, death, and the corruption of nature itself.$(br2)Within these pages, you will find rituals to summon and destroy, sigils to command the elements, and the secrets of creating life from blood.

pages.title: Prerequisites
pages.text: This tome assumes you have mastered the basics of $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/blood-magic)Blood Magic$(). You should be familiar with:$(li)The Blood Altar and LP$(li)Weak Blood Orbs$(li)Basic Rituals$(li)Soul Network$(br)If you are new to Blood Magic, consult the $(l:bloodmagic:guide)Blood Magic Guide$() first.
